body.name: Reaper : A Slow Burn MC Romance Novel (The Devil's Riders Book 1)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a new author for me, but I am hooked!! Great story line and characters that you can relate to! This is now one of my favorite MC romance authors, right up there with Megan O'Brien, Esther Schmidt, A.G. Kirkham, Ciara St. James, and Marteeka Karland. Hoping that the next book in series will be as good or better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lynnie and Reaper
reviews.reviewText: Lynnie has lived with a cult since she was ten, her mother married the cult's leader. Now her stepfather wants to lake her his fifth wife, that is not the life she wants for herself. She hopes she can get the President of the Devil's Riders MC, Reaper Jameson, can help her escape. Reaper's club sells guns to the cult for the coming "End Times".Reaper agrees to save his Angel from the cult, and she goes with Reaper. But it maybe short lived as others want what Reapers has, he mist protect what is now his.I received a free copy of this book and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lynnie and reaper
reviews.reviewText: Lynnie (angel) had the courage to escape her deranged family. Love the action no so much drama with the club girls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More From This Author Please!
reviews.reviewText: I loved this book! I know I’ll love a book if it grabs me in the first few pages and this one did! If you want a smart, hot, sexy read with a great storyline this books for you!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From Cult to Chaos: A Journey of Survival and Love
reviews.reviewText: “The Devil’s Riders” by Parker Daniels is a gripping tale of survival, rebellion, and unexpected love set against the backdrop of a near dystopian reality. The protagonist’s struggle to escape her stepfather’s oppressive rule and her subsequent alliance with the enigmatic Reaper Jameson, the President of the Devil’s Riders MC, forms the crux of the narrative.The author masterfully weaves a story that is both thrilling and emotionally charged. The protagonist’s journey from a sheltered existence within a cult to the harsh realities of the outside world is portrayed with raw honesty. Her deal with Reaper, trading her body for his help, adds a layer of complexity to her character and their relationship.Daniels’ writing style is engaging, with vivid descriptions that bring the characters and settings to life. The plot is fast-paced with elements of danger, mystery, action, and adventure that keep the reader hooked till the end. The sensual scenes and power dynamics between the characters add depth to the narrative, making it a compelling read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Reaper and his Angel
reviews.reviewText: While dealing weapons with a cult leader, Reaper comes across his Angel. Angel is trying to escape the cult. This book was really heavy on certain scenes and not so much on building the plot.I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good MC romance
reviews.reviewText: Reaper (Book 1 of The Devil's Riders) by Parker Daniels. This story features Reaper and Lynnie, their unusual connection and intense chemistry, along with action packed drama, and tons of turmoil kept me glued to the pages until the very end. I enjoyed this story and would recommend to others. I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A MC president falls for the beautiful woman the cult leader plans to marry.
reviews.reviewText: Reaper is the president of the Devils Riders MC .his club has been selling weapons to Alice the leader of the Gods Settlers cult.When he first lays eyes on Lynne she's the most beautiful woman he's ever seen.She looks so innocent and yet has a body made for sin. Her step father Works the leaders of what Reaper calls a cult decides she is to be his sixth wife when she turns eighteen in a few weeks she will be joining her mother as one of his wife's but Lynne will promise Reaper anything as long as he helps her escape.There are so many twists and turns to this story you will be riveted til the very last page.I love the way this amazing author brings the story to life before your eyes and you can feel the characters emotions and their pain.Will Reaper help get Lynne away from the Gods Settlers ?Will they fall in love with each other?I can hardly wait to see what's next by this multi talented author.
